idea: Ours is an e-commerce website specially designed, developed and build, to create a virtual market place or a platform for Licensed Medical /Pharmacy stores or Medical Equipment manufacturers /sellers, and other companies with in India, who are already having required permission, licenses, authorization and competency to sell, Medicine / pharmacy and other related product, and have shown intention to sell them, to the prospected customer, already registered with us. idea:
Brief: Noam Fashion



• About the Brand: Noam Fashion brand is inspired by Korean fashion, selling stylish, elegant structured fashion accessories
It is about giving natural beautiful designs to feel more You!


• Brand Personality: Modern, elegant, classy, chic, mid range affordable

• Brand Image: Rich, International designs

• Target Audience: 20+ Age group, Gender Fluid
India: Metros and few Tier 2 cities
Educated Working Gen, likes Fashion and does not mind spending for a good design and decent quality. 



• Price Range: INR 1200 to 3,300/-

• Brand Position: Mid range, affordable great designs with a elite look
Close to Zara, Aldo and placement of products to be in like ASOS and TOPSHOP
name: Noam Fashion
